Hero Classes

Hero classes in Remixed Pixel Dungeon define the starting equipment, stats, and special abilities of the playable characters. Each class has its own unique playstyle and mechanics.

Available Classes

  • Warrior - A melee-focused class with high durability - Code Reference
  • Mage - A spellcaster with various magical abilities - Code Reference
  • Rogue - A stealth-focused class with high evasion - Code Reference
  • Huntress - A ranged combat specialist - Code Reference
  • Elf - A natural magic user with ranged capabilities - Code Reference
  • Necromancer - A death magic specialist - Code Reference
  • Gnoll - A unique class with witchcraft affinity - Code Reference
  • Priest - A healing-focused class - Code Reference
  • Doctor - A class focused on disease mechanics - Code Reference

Class Mechanics

Each hero class has:

  • Unique starting equipment based on JSON configuration - Code Reference
  • Special class abilities or affinities - Code Reference
  • Different base stats (strength, health, etc.) - Code Reference
  • Unique class armor obtained through the Armor Kit - Code Reference
  • Class-specific immunities and resistances - Code Reference
  • Class-specific perks and bonuses - Code Reference

Class Unlocking

  • All classes except Doctor and Priest are available from the start - Code Reference
  • The Huntress, Elf, and Gnoll classes can also be unlocked by achieving specific badges or donating to the developer - Code Reference
  • Some classes have special unlock requirements as documented on their individual pages

See Also

Code References

  • HeroClass.java - Main implementation
  • initHeroes.json - Class setup configuration
